SEARCH
Package elevator

Class Elevator

java.lang.Object
elevator.Elevator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Elevator extends Object implements Serializable
The Elevator class represents an elevator in the simulation. Implements Serializable to allow saving and loading the state of the elevator.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Elevator

      public Elevator(Building building, int maxPerson, int initialFloor, String direction)
      Constructs an Elevator object with the specified building, maximum number of people, initial floor, and direction.
      Parameters:
      building - the building object
      maxPerson - the maximum number of people the elevator can hold
      initialFloor - the initial floor of the elevator
      direction - the initial direction of the elevator
